sentences: Vanglasse minek oli tema jaoks suur shock.
context: "Vanglasse" is an Estonian word that means "to prison" or "into jail". It's in the illative case (ending -sse), indicating movement into a location. This form suggests someone being sent to or going to prison. The dictionary definition shows it relates to being taken into police custody or falling into the hands of authorities, which aligns with its meaning of imprisonment.
